name: U.A. MVP
text:
(This card is always treated as a "F.A." card.)
After damage calculation, when your "U.A." or "F.A." monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle or inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Special Summon any number of "U.A." and/or "F.A." monsters with different names from your hand and/or GY in Defense Position. You can only activate 1 "U.A. MVP" per turn.
